title: 【OOC】雷电拳MOD1.8
author: 新之助~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-17 20:23 编辑 

===============================================================

介绍

===============================================================

雷电拳

===============================================================

功能

===============================================================

被打的生物会被雷击


===============================================================

图片

===============================================================


（发现一个BUG在用本MOD打生物、生物会消失一下）

===============================================================

OOC

===============================================================

雷电拳

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-20 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-13 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-13 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-11 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-9 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-8 ~8 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-7 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @p[score_damage_min=1] damage 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=6,type=!Player] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-5 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~0 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~0 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"~作者大大~\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False}",Text2:"{text:\\"新之助~\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False}",Text3:"{text:\\"雷电拳MOD\\",color:black,bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False}",Text4:""}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-2 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~0 ~5 ~4 ~0 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~24 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
========================================================
原理

========================================================

/scoreboard objectives add damage stat.damageDealt
创建一个计分板
/gamerule commandBlockOutput false
关闭提示
/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[r=6,type=!Player] ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~
探测积分为1的生物
在给玩家6格的生物发射雷电
/execute @p[score_damage_min=1] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players set @p[score_damage_min=1] damage 0
吧积分为1的玩家改成0



========================================================

作者的话

========================================================

本MOD是我自己想的
如果有雷同
那就算了



========================================================

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
新之助~ 发表于 2016-10-23 16:19
不懂...............
意思就是标题和正文的字体、大小、间距、颜色完全一样，应当有所区分。例如
